definition: classics/sacred book/scripture/to pass through/to undergo/to bear/to endure/warp (textile)/longitude/menstruation/channel (TCM)/abbr. for economics 經濟|经济[jing1 ji4]
to cross a river/to aid or relieve/to be of help
only used in 濟濟|济济[ji3 ji3]
used in place names associated with the Ji River 濟水|济水[Ji3 Shui3]/surname Ji
system/to control/to regulate/variant of 製|制[zhi4]

sentences.english: However the market economy system has brought about a strong dash to the heating supply of the cogeneration.
sentences.chinese: 市场经济体制带给热电联产向采暖供热以猛烈冲击。

sentences.english: A exert earthing to emerging-market economies weselves too be at hor.
sentences.chinese: 新兴留洋探索经济体制的硬着陆也即将到来。

sentences.english: The tax distribution fiscal system conforms to the intrinsic requirement of the market economy system.
sentences.chinese: 分税制财政体制与市场经济体制的内在要求相一致。

sentences.english: Modern market economy is a mixed economy system.
sentences.chinese: 现代市场经济实际上是一种混合经济体制。

sentences.english: China has been perfecting its Socialist Market-oriented Economy System.
sentences.chinese: 中国正努力完善社会主义的市场经济体制。

sentences.english: Reforms in the economic and political structure are very closely intertwined and mutually reinforced.
sentences.chinese: 其中经济体制和政治体制的改革交织甚密，互为促进。

sentences.english: And in connection with these, it is necessary to further deepen the reform of both urban and rural economic system.
sentences.chinese: 与此相联系，还必须进一步深化城乡经济体制改革。

sentences.english: For the market economy, a dual-pricing system was tried in 979.
sentences.chinese: 在979年的市场经济体制下，价格双轨制开始实行。

sentences.english: They made tremendous efforts to reform the old economic system.
sentences.chinese: 他们作出巨大的努力来改变革旧的经济体制。

sentences.english: The cogeneration has rapidly developed in our country under the planning system.
sentences.chinese: 计划经济体制下，我国的热电联产得到迅速发展。

sentences.english: Along with our country socialist market economy system establishment and the consummation .
sentences.chinese: 随着我国社会主义市场经济体制的确立和完善。

sentences.english: Chapter in China's planned economic system to explore historic.
sentences.chinese: 第一章是对中国计划经济体制进行历史性的探究。

sentences.english: Macroscopically, models of economy information systems(EIS)of a country depend on the national economy system structure.
sentences.chinese: 经济信息系统的目标模式依赖于经济体制和管理要求。

sentences.english: The economic system of the United States is principally one of private ownership.
sentences.chinese: 美国的经济体制主要是一种私有制。

sentences.english: A hard landing for emerging-market economies may also be at hand.
sentences.chinese: 新兴市场经济体制的硬着陆也即将到来。

sentences.english: Any economic system, but especially a market economy, produces winners and losers.
sentences.chinese: 任何经济体制，尤其是市场经济，都有输有赢。

definition: natural economy (exchange of goods by bartering not involving money)
relations between levels of production/socio-economic relations
